nodes.text: Umu was the second son of the Hieroprince, an individual in the religion of the Opaline Creed, a faction on the Outer Rim planet Crucival. By 4 BBY, Umu's name was given to at least seven individuals in the Creed, including Hazram Namir, who went by the name Umu Seven.
Umu was mentioned in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
